## Research questions 
- What contributes to hippocampal gene expression variation?
- How do experimental treatments shape expression variation?
- How robust are expression patterns?
- What genes control hippocampal functions like memory?

## Effects of chemical dissociation
0.07% of genes (102+27/17575) repond to treatment. 
Hippocampal sub-region explains more of the variation (PC1).
